attributes.action: Full pay to staff in small businesses,emergency services if lock down or closure
attributes.additional_details: Paid from the expense of the government after what they receive from us hard working people every week/month  it doesn't seem much to ask in a time in need
attributes.background: Full payment in wages to small business workers, if isolation, closures or lock down occurs and to the NHS supporting us in this time of need including emergency services we pay our taxes and national insurance surely we should receive some back n a time of need not a government loan

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301652

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
